Description: FRagment of oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-red; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with grape cluster symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '219'. Name Herakleon. For the dating see I. Nicolaou, Paphos V. The stamped amphora handles, 425-6. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0601.39.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (157)
